statements: SELECT * FROM crypto_wallet_addresses

SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY date DESC;

SELECT address_id, sum(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY address_id;
SELECT address_id, wallet_address FROM wallet_addresses JOIN transactions ON wallet_addresses.address_id = transactions.address_id;
